caption.title: The main sources of the location database of medicinal plants, put together by the BioMAP project 2004â€“8.
caption.p: Many of the records upon which the MSc and PhD theses are based are in the main Cairo Herbarium, but they declined to give access to their database without payment. The BioMAP team of taxonomists included the organisers of the OpWall expeditions and the Medicinal Plants project, hence their access to these records.
Click here for additional data file.
